QuestionTxt: (Now I would like to ask you about some things that have been in the news recently.  Not everyone will have heard of them.) Do you happen to know if the Dow Jones Industrial Average is currently closer to 2,000, 4,000, 8,000, or 13,000?
SurveySponsor: Pew Research Center for the People & the Press
SourceDoc: Pew Research Center for the People & the Press Political Knowledge Survey
